name: Angry Monkey Super Fight: Mud Toss Blast
name_original: Angry Monkey Super Fight: Mud Toss Blast
description:
Everyone loves a good mud fight! What's not to love about using strategy, speed, and strength to get the best of your opponent? Now, you can experience the thrill of one of nature's best games without having to step outside!

Choose between 1 or 2 players to get the game started. Then, with the first view of the amazing graphics that take you right into the scene, it's game on!

Use your skills and strategic planning to am and throw. You want to land on your target to rack up the most points. It's great addictive fun as you attempt over and over again to strike your opponent. This is one instance where it's not only okay to hit your friend-it's required! It's all in good fun, of course, because they're trying to hit you back!

Let your arm do the swinging as you carefully figure out your strategies to get the most hits. This is one game everyone will enjoy. After all, who doesn't enjoy a good mud fight-especially when you can do it without getting dirty!

Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
